title: WonderLand
description: Kaleb "Rabbit" White hates everything about his life, especially his job at Red Queen Inc. He had plans to quit until a company experiment went wrong, killing an entire room full of people... Except for one: Alice.It’s been four years since Alice survived the virus responsible for her mother’s death. She's managing to keep the side effects of WonderLand under control and is doing her best to put the trauma of her past behind her. Then, she receives a notecard with one word on it:“Run.”Alice needs answers. Kaleb wants to protect her. Trapped inside Red Queen Inc., they must work together to find a way out. But first Alice needs to find the cure.
author: Miranda Renae
